Book to Book //info descriptions Show off your book collection in an organized manner Swap books with other users in your area Discover new books based on what you like You're receiving this email because you requested a password reset for your account. To set a new password, insert the following verification code in the reset password page in the application. If you don't want to change your password or didn't request this, you can safely disregard this email.
If this issue persists feel free to contact the support team at booktobookcs@gmail.com or reply to this email.

Thank you,
The BookToBook team
